value.halfverse:
he is enthroned upon the cherubim;
 let the earth shake.
value.verse:
The LORD is King;
let the people tremble; *

value.halfverse: he is high above all peoples.
value.verse: The LORD is great in Zion; *
Let them confess his Name, which is great and awesome; *

“O mighty King, lover of justice,
you have established equity; *
value.halfverse: you have executed justice and righteousness in Jacob.”

value.verse:
Proclaim the greatness of the LORD our God
and fall down before his footstool; *

value.halfverse: they called upon the LORD, and he answered them.
value.verse:
Moses and Aaron among his priests,
and Samuel among those who call upon his Name, *
He spoke to them out of the pillar of cloud; *
value.halfverse: they kept his testimonies and the decree that he gave them.

you were a God who forgave them,
 yet punished them for their evil deeds.”
value.verse: “O LORD our God, you answered them indeed; *

value.halfverse: for the LORD our God is the Holy One.
value.verse:
Proclaim the greatness of the LORD our God
and worship him upon his holy hill; *
